summary: Adds five lore-friendly camps of varying simplicity to the game to enhance the exploration experience.
descriptionHtml:
Some of my favorite mods are ones that add small new places to discover as I'm wandering. In this spirit, I've added five small campsites scattered across Skyrim. Stop in and peek around or spend the night if you'd like. All containers in the camps are non-respawning and safe for storage. There are few amenities, no god weapons and no new enemies (unless you really hate butterflies) in this mod. These are simply for flavor.

Available in both No MapMarker and MapMarker editions to suit different playstyles.

Please feel free to upload images of your character at the camps when you find them. I'd love to see them.


Future Plans
===========

More camps and some with inhabitants.
author: Bethjunkie
